sentence.Network_en: A fine - grained, light - colored granitic rock consisting primarily of orthoclase and quartz.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种由铁锰钨酸盐组成的矿物, 晶体状,主要的钨矿石,见于与花岗岩伴生的石英脉中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...钾长石是以不同比例的钠和钾互相取代，包括正长石(orthoclase)、微斜长石(microcline)和透长石(sanidine)，及冰长石(adularia)和歪长石(anorthoclase).
orthic solonetz 典型碱土orthoclase 钾长石orthogonal coefficient 正交系数

in the Triassic-early Jurassic , the emplacement mechanism of and orthoclase granite is dominated by tectonic extension and the diapirism is strong .晚三迭世-早侏罗世二长、正长花岗岩体就位过程中构造扩展机制起主导作用，岩浆底辟作用也较强；

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from ortho- 'straight' + Greek klasis 'breaking' (because of the characteristic two cleavages at right angles)

means.word_mean: 1. a white or colored monoclinic feldspar
